import React from 'react' import Book from './Book' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' class BooksList extends React.Component { static propTypes = { books: PropTypes.array.isRequired, } render() { const { books } = this.props console.log(books) const currReading = books.filter((book) => ( book.shelf === 'currentlyReading' )) const wannaRead = books.filter((book) => ( book.shelf === 'wantToRead' )) const read = books.filter((book) => ( book.shelf === 'read' )) console.log(currReading) console.log(wannaRead) console.log(read) return (

Currently Reading

Want to Read

Read

) } } export default BooksList
